# Gamble (by TerrierDarts)

This game allows your viewers to risk their points for a double or nothing chance! The percentage can be controlled by you so you can make it easier or harder to win!

## Import Code

```text

```

## Configuration

The Code should compile straight away as it only needs.

```text
mscorlib.dll
```

You will need to create the following commands.

```text
!gamble = Tied to Gamble Roulette
```

## Editable Settings

`winPercentage` This controls how often you want your viewers to win, the higher the more chance.
`defaultBet` This is the default bet amount if the user doesnt specify.
